channel.title: How to make a system yell for 508?
channel.description: i wanna make a system yell for my server. just dont know how to make one or add one. any help?

item.title: How to make a system yell for 508?
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“jj0001, post:2, topic:317545”] if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { playerCommand = playerCommand.toLowerCase(); String message = playerCommand.substring(5); String titles = ""; if (p.rights == 0) { return; } if (p.rights == 1) { titles = "<img=0>[Moderator] "; } if (p.rights == 2) { titles = "<img=1>[Administrator] "; } for(Player pl : Engine.players) p.getActionSender().sendMessage(pl, titles + "" + p.username + ": " +message); }i think that should work…
also i take no credit for this[/quote]ty

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a system yell for 508?

item.title: How to make a system yell for 508?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[code]	if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) {
		playerCommand = playerCommand.toLowerCase();
		String message = playerCommand.substring(5);
		String titles = "";
		if (p.rights == 0) {
		return;
		}
		if (p.rights == 1) {
		titles = "<img=0>[Moderator] ";
		}
		if (p.rights == 2) {
		titles = "<img=1>[Administrator] ";
                    }
		for(Player pl : Engine.players)
		p.getActionSender().sendMessage(pl, titles + "" + p.username + ": " +message);
		}[/code]i think that should work..

also i take no credit for this

Read full topic
